feed.title: Heavy Hitters
feed.subtitle: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

entry.title: DeAndre Hopkins to the Chiefs Reaction, CFB Week 9, NFL Week 8, UFC 308 and MLB World Series Predictions - Season 3 Episode 47

link.title: DeAndre Hopkins to the Chiefs Reaction, CFB Week 9, NFL Week 8, UFC 308 and MLB World Series Predictions - Season 3 Episode 47

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to Tennessee Titans star WR DeAndre Hopkins getting traded to the Kansas City Chiefs. After that, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL. Finally, Dean closes out the episode by also giving his predictions for the MLB World Series this year along with the main fights this Saturday at UFC 308.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: CFB Week 8 and NFL Week 7 Picks, MLB ALCS and NLCS Updates, Davante Adams and Amari Cooper Trade Reactions - Season 3 Episode 46

link.title: CFB Week 8 and NFL Week 7 Picks, MLB ALCS and NLCS Updates, Davante Adams and Amari Cooper Trade Reactions - Season 3 Episode 46

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean starts off the episode by giving us an update based on what’s happening in the MLB with the postseason being in the ALCS and NLCS stage. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to Las Vegas Raiders star WR Davante Adams getting traded to the New York Jets and Cleveland Browns star WR Amari Cooper getting traded to the Buffalo Bills and what it means for both teams after acquiring the two biggest names on the market prior to the trade deadline. Finally, Dean closes out the episode by giving us his pics for this week’s games and both college football and the NFL.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: CFB Week 7 and NFL Week 6 Picks, MLB Postseason Review, and NHL 2024-25 Season Predictions - Season 3 Episode 45

link.title: CFB Week 7 and NFL Week 6 Picks, MLB Postseason Review, and NHL 2024-25 Season Predictions - Season 3 Episode 45

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for the games this weekend in both college football and the NFL. Along with that, Dean gives us a review and an update with what’s been going on in the MLB postseason. Finally, Dean gives us his predictions for the upcoming 2024-25 NHL season.

entry.title: MLB Wild Card Round Update, WWE Bad Blood Predictions, AEW TV Deal Review, Davante Adams Trade Rumor Reactions, and NFL Week 5 Picks (ft. Jack Acello) - Season 3 Episode 44

link.title: MLB Wild Card Round Update, WWE Bad Blood Predictions, AEW TV Deal Review, Davante Adams Trade Rumor Reactions, and NFL Week 5 Picks (ft. Jack Acello) - Season 3 Episode 44

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean, and special guest Jack Acello, give us an update on what has happened in the wildcard round of the 2024 MLB postseason along with their reactions to each series. After that, Dean and Jack give us their predictions for the upcoming WWE PLE Bad Blood that takes place this Saturday along with a review of the newly announced TV deal for AEW. To close out the episode, Dean and Jack both give us a reaction to how they feel about the trade rumors regarding Raiders star WR Davante Adams along with their picks for this week’s games in week 5 of the NFL season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: CFB Week 5 and NFL Week 4 Picks, MLB Late Season Review, and Matthew Sluka Leaves UNLV Over NIL Dispute Reaction - Season 3 Episode 43

link.title: CFB Week 5 and NFL Week 4 Picks, MLB Late Season Review, and Matthew Sluka Leaves UNLV Over NIL Dispute Reaction - Season 3 Episode 43

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his picks for this week’s games in both college football and the NFL. Along with that, he gives us a review of what’s been going on in baseball as he gives us an update on the standings and his predictions based on how the rest of the season will go in the final week of the regular season. Finally, Dean closes out the show as he breaks some news regarding UNLV QB Matthew Sluka leaving the football program over an NIL dispute and gives us his reaction to the news and how it’ll impact the future of college football.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: MLB Wild Card Updates and AL East Divisional Race, CFB Week 3 Picks, NFL Week 2 Picks, and UFC 306 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 41

link.title: MLB Wild Card Updates and AL East Divisional Race, CFB Week 3 Picks, NFL Week 2 Picks, and UFC 306 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 41

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us an update based off of what has been going on in the MLB and his thoughts on the wildcard race in the American and National League along with the divisional race for the AL East. Dean also gives us his predictions for this week’s games in college football and the NFL along with UFC 306 at the Sphere.

entry.title: CFB Week 2 and NFL Week 1 Picks, Leon Draisaitl and Trent Williams Get Paid - Season 3 Episode 40

link.title: CFB Week 2 and NFL Week 1 Picks, Leon Draisaitl and Trent Williams Get Paid - Season 3 Episode 40

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his week 2 picks in college football along with his picks for week 1 of the 2024 NFL season that kicks off on Thursday. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to Oilers star Centre Leon Draisaitl and 49ers star Offensive tackle Trent Williams both earning big contracts and resigning with their teams.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: CFB Week 1 Picks, NFL 2024-25 Season Predictions, AEW All in 2024 Recap and WWE Bash in Berlin Preview - Season 3 Episode 39

link.title: CFB Week 1 Picks, NFL 2024-25 Season Predictions, AEW All in 2024 Recap and WWE Bash in Berlin Preview - Season 3 Episode 39

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his week 1 picks to kickoff the 2024 college football season for the big games this weekend along with his predictions for the 2024-25 NFL season. After that, Dean gives us a recap of AEW All In, which took place this past Sunday. He also gives us his takeaways for the event and his grade. To end off the episode, Dean gives us a preview of WWE Bash In Berlin, which is this Saturday and who he thinks wins each match.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Haason Reddick and Brandon Aiyuk Trade Request Updates and MLB Post Trade-Deadline Takeaways - Season 3 Episode 38

link.title: Haason Reddick and Brandon Aiyuk Trade Request Updates and MLB Post Trade-Deadline Takeaways - Season 3 Episode 38

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean provides us an update in regards to Haason Reddick requesting a trade from the New York Jets on Monday along with another update regarding Brandon Aiyuk after his trade request form the San Francisco 49ers and where those situations stand. After that, Dean closes out the episode by giving us his takeaways since the MLB trade deadline and All-Star break.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
